### This file is automatically generated by Qt Design Studio.
### Do not change

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.14)

project(DormitoryApp LANGUAGES CXX)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

qt_add_library(content STATIC)

find_package(Qt6 6.2 REQUIRED COMPONENTS Core Gui Qml Quick Sql)

qt6_add_qml_module(content
    URI "content"
    VERSION 1.0
    RESOURCE_PREFIX "/qt/qml"
    QML_FILES
        App.qml
        SwitchTableAccess.ui.qml
        SelectorPage.ui.qml
        BackupsPage.qml
        LogsViewPage.qml
        MainPage.qml
        FreeQueriesPage.qml
        LoginFrame.qml
        MainFrame.qml
        AdministarationSelector.qml
        TableManipulator.qml

    RESOURCES
        fonts/fonts.txt
        SOURCES mainsqlconnection.h mainsqlconnection.cpp
        SOURCES directoryfiles.h directoryfiles.cpp
        SOURCES backupactions.h backupactions.cpp
        SOURCES constants.h constants.cpp

)

target_link_libraries(content PRIVATE
    Qt6::Core
    Qt6::Gui
    Qt6::Qml
    Qt6::Quick
    Qt6::Sql
)
